channel.title: ASX:MIN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mineral Resources Swings to Hefty Loss Due to Lithium Weakness
item.description: Mineral Resources Ltd. swung to a full-year net loss, with the diversified Australian miner hit by weakness in global lithium markets.
